notices.title: Semester Exams Schedule
notices.content: Semester exams will start from 20th November. Check department notice boards for subject-wise schedules.

notices.title: Library Closed for Maintenance
notices.content: The central library will be closed on 10th November due to maintenance. Online resources remain available.

events.title: Welcome Orientation for New Students
events.details: Orientation for all first-year students at 10:00 AM.
